name: Who are you? (Selin Begüm Karayaka)
description:
It's a digital poem of 2019 elections of Turkey. 

You need choose your side!

Who are you?

There are two groups of people waiting for  your choise for to be concrete. Listen people and decide which side is your side, who are you?

Choose wisely and see the results...

What effects our desicions?

Are  those really important?

? signs are the gates.

Use arrow keys for move.
